strings.evolution:
The attitude of a ruler, I have not.
As a Warrior of Dawn,
I shall fight alongside you!
strings.affinity:
When I look at you young people, it brings me back to my younger days.
How long it has been...
strings.description: An old warrior from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. Galuf was one of the four original Warriors of Dawn who first sealed the warlock Exdeath. However, the seal eventually broke freeing Exdeath in the process, which lead Galuf to seek the help of Bartz and his friends in another world. Determined to protect his comrades and family, he lost his life facing Exdeath in battle. His will now lives on in his granddaughter Krile, whom he continues supporting in spirit.
strings.fusion:
All is fine.
I'll join ya!
These beasts are nothing to me.
strings.summon:
Above being the King of Bal,
I am your ally!
Feel free to call me Galuf.

strings.evolution:
I won't lose to you younglings yet!
I'll show you how real warriors were made in the old days!
strings.affinity:
When I look at you young people, it brings me back to my younger days.
How long it has been...
strings.description: An old warrior from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. He was the king of Bal in the Second World, and one of the Warriors of Dawn who formerly sealed away Exdeath. Unable to defeat Exdeath in a contest of strength, the Warriors had little choice but to seal him in the First World. Galuf has been haunted ever since by the fear that he left another world infected with the seeds of destruction. His love for peace and for his comrades is beyond compare, and inspires him to take on Exdeath in one-on-one combat, in order to save Bartz and the other Warriors of Light in the Great Forest of Moore.
strings.fusion:
I've got to pick up the pace a bit or
Krile will scold me again!
I won't let you young'uns leave me behind!
strings.summon:
I am Galuf, King of Bal!
My hair may be gray, but I'm a Warrior of Dawn all the same!

strings.evolution:
I remember!
I was one of the Dawn Warriors!
I finally remember everything!
strings.affinity:
When I look at you young people, it brings me back to my younger days.
How long it has been...
strings.description: An old warrior from another world who appears in the tales of the Crystals. He first met Bartz and his allies in the aftermath of a meteorite strike. At that time, he had no memory of his identity, save his own name and his duty to protect the Crystals. As he journeys with the others, though, he recalls more and more of his past life. He remembers that he comes from a different world than the one Bartz and the others live in. And there, he had been one of the four Warriors of Dawn, who sealed the warlock Exdeath in the past after a desperate struggle.
strings.fusion:
What a warm feeling...
It reminds me of the crystals' power.
strings.summon:
I am not from this world!
...Wait, why do I feel like I've said this before?
